channel.title: R on Shreyas Ragavan
channel.description: Recent content in R on Shreyas Ragavan

item.title: Section 1: R Basics, Functions, Data types
item.description: Table of Contents R was developed by statisticians and data analysts as an interactive environment for data analysis. It is not like C or Java. R is free and Open source. Runs on all major platforms. Data objects and Scripts can be shared seamlessly across these platforms. R Console: for interactive commands, similar to the python interpreter. Installing R on Arch Linux : sudo pacman -Sy r Once R is installed, I was able to seamlesly use it in Org-babel, using the source ‘R’.
